>
> > Expecting your immediate reply with solution.
>
> You're expecting quite a bit, there. 
I too agree. Seems evident from the above line :-)

> Perhaps a cultural difference, but I find it impolite to expect someone to 
> hand you an immediate reply with a solution, so I have handed you an 
> immediately reply with the way to find the solution.
Perhaps inexperience in writing to lists for help :-) and definitely not a 
cultural difference !!
